name: Plee Pluu
description:
This game was made for the GGJ 2022.

Use the mouse to freeze the platforms!

How high can you go?

Controlls:

W/A/D or Arrow Keys to move!

Mouse Button Left: Freeze/Unfreeze Platforms

Mouse Button Right: Rotate Platforms (only if unfreezed)

Check out my other games!

Game by Marvin Woelke
